menu.menudata: select floor(tracks.year/10)*10,case when tracks.year>0 then concat(floor(tracks.year/10)*10,'s') else 'Unknown' end from tracks where tracks.audio=1 group by floor(tracks.year/10)*10 order by tracks.year asc

option.name: Sort by artist
option.menudata: select albums.id,concat(albums.title, ' (', contributors.name ,')') from tracks,albums,contributor_track,contributors where tracks.id=contributor_track.track and tracks.album=albums.id and contributor_track.contributor=contributors.id and contributor_track.role in (1,5) and tracks.year>={year} and tracks.year<{year}+10 group by albums.id order by contributors.namesort asc,albums.year desc

menu.menudata: select albums.id,albums.title,substr(albums.titlesort,1,1) from tracks,albums where tracks.audio=1 and albums.id=tracks.album and tracks.year>={year} and tracks.year<{year}+10 group by albums.id order by {orderby}

select tracks.id,tracks.title from tracks,albums where tracks.audio=1 and tracks.album={album} and tracks.year>={year} and tracks.year<{year}+10 group by tracks.id order by tracks.tracknum asc,tracks.titlesort asc
